formalpara.title: Figure 2. Variation in model system sex determination
formalpara.para: Though mammals, Drosophila, and C. elegans all use GSD, they interpret their sex chromosome content through distinct signal transduction pathways. However, all three eventually converge on a DM family member whose expression is associated with male development. Drosophila Dsx is unusual for DM genes in also having an important role in female development (through a female-specific splice variant).
